name: Gift Blox (Centi Games)
description:
Help delivering gifts, hear the crunching of the snow, enjoy retro 32 bit aesthetics and solve 9 challenging puzzles!

Controls

  • Move the gift with "W", "A", "S", and "D" on your keyboard or the left joystick on your gamepad
  • Restart a level with "R" on your keyboard or "Select" on your gamepad

This game was made for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021.

The performance and gaming experience of the downloaded builds is better compared to the Web version. Linux and macOS build have not been tested by me.
